sentences.english: Believe that cigarette packaging rotogravure printing ink needs will increase.
sentences.chinese: 猜忌烟包不凸版油墨的需求也会因此补充。

sentences.english: General lithographic, gravure, flexo printing, and varnish process after printing.
sentences.chinese: 一般平版，凹版，凸版印刷及印后上光油加工。

sentences.english: Use acid-free paper for relief printing so it will last longer.
sentences.chinese: 使用无酸的凸版印刷纸，使其将持续较长时间。

sentences.english: Use a light table to transfer relief printing image to wood block.
sentences.chinese: 使用光桌转移凸版印刷图像块木头。

sentences.english: The technology is already established in the flexo and letterpress market for many years.
sentences.chinese: 该技术已经成立了柔性版印刷和凸版经过多年的市场。

sentences.english: Monitoring the ink viscosity is very important to flexography printing.
sentences.chinese: 掌握好油墨的黏度对于苯胺凸版印刷非常重要。

sentences.english: Depending on the requirement, either letter-press printing blocks or gravure printing places can be produced.
sentences.chinese: 视乎需要，它可以造成供凸版或凹版印刷用的印版。

sentences.english: A line or coarse screen half-tone block etched on zinc for letterpress printing.
sentences.chinese: 线条锌版活版印刷用的线条或粗网半色调凸版。

sentences.english: Hereby the study can treat the better of runnability and printability of water-based ink and flexography.
sentences.chinese: 借此探讨最适弹性凸版印刷之水性印墨适性。

sentences.english: Block printing is the easiest kind of relief printing.
sentences.chinese: 雕版印刷是一种最简单的凸版印刷。

sentences.english: In development is a mission to up-cycle the now obsolete letterpress.
sentences.chinese: 将来的发展是循环回收现已被淘汰的凸版印刷。

definition: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
color printing using several overlaid images
acrylic (loanword)/see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]
color printing using several overlaid images
color printing/abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]
